channel.title: Couple Things I need Help With (again)
channel.description:
Ok couple things i need help with!!!
SORRY FOR ALL THESE POST WITH HELP
Need No.1 STILL NEED Ok does anyone know the original godsword attack/walk/run and all that stuff anim?
Need No.2 STILL NEED How do you make range work?
Problem No.1 STILL NEED HELP How do you fix all the nulls in clients? Or can someone give me a link to a client with very few/none nulls?
Problem No.2 STILL NEED HELP When i do a command and the command activates it will yell the last few/last letter of the command to the server. like i do ::varrok it will automatically do ::yell k without me doing command ::yell
Need No.3 STILL NEED How do you add emotes? like jig and all that stuff
Need No.4 STILL NEED I need a model maker? Can anyone give?
Ok thats about all i need/need help with.... I am using the galkon client base and i keep getting nulls Please post under any solutions/links to help me
Need No.5 STILL NEED Original Pk Spots
Problem No. 3 NPC's dont attack
REQUEST A good client (regular Runescape) not 508 or 503 (cant get them to work) and if i did i dont want to satart over CLIENT WITH NO NULLS!
THANK YOU FOR HELPING!!!!

item.title: Couple Things I need Help With (again)
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Ok ty >.< might not want to mess with a lot of things… I might mess up

comeee onnn

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Things I need Help With (again)

item.description:
@mylust4blood wrote:

np anyway the last thing is to shoot arrows correctly search the bow’s code in client.java and change the animation and timer speed im out

Read full topic

item.title: Couple Things I need Help With (again)
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

[quote=“mylust4blood, post:2, topic:232914”]1. there is no real gs walk stance or att: in my oppinion use karils hold walk and run and use 2h crush

2: in tuts look up adding range if not ill look for a code: are you looking to add a bow or rune c’bow?

  1. To fix nulls you need to get models to fill them in

2: that means that the command is messed up use a tut and fix it

3: emotes idk how to add but in the last or one of the folder in ur server file you will see emote list thats were u find codes

  1. model maker go to client hacking section and look for it if not the silabsoft forums have one but make sure to come back here :P[/quote]

Wow thanks alot i wasnt expecting all the things i need help with in one post =P

Ok no.1 Thanks alot havent been able to figure out GS

no.2 im not trying to add a bow… Im trying to make it so it shoots correctly… With what i got now it will go up to the enemy like it’s going to hit with sword but then it shoots. Im trying to get it so that my player stands away from enemy then shoots. (arrows also dont show on ground)

No.1 Ty for the null fixing but do you have a client that would be good for fixing this? Because theres so many items that have nulls

No.2 Hmm the yell command looks fine but its also different than others that i have seen. ( i have looked for a tut but can’t find one) Do you have a working yell?

No.3 hehe i didn’t think anyone would know how =P

No.4 Thanks! wouldn’t of guessed in the hack section

Tyvm if i could rep i would (when i get 15 rep i will try and find you again to rep)
THANKS!

Read full topic
item.source: Couple Things I need Help With (again)

3: emotes idk how to add but in the last or one of the folder in ur server file you will see emote list thats were u find codes

  1. model maker go to client hacking section and look for it if not the silabsoft forums have one but make sure to come back here
